item.title: Drawing A Line in the Randomness: General Linear Models and Simulations
item.description: Introduction Chosing parameters General Linear Model Reverse Engineering Running Analyses (Welchâ€™s t Test) Analysis (ANOVA) Power Analysis Brute Force Power Analysis Introduction I am currently planning a replication and extension of an experimental study that had a count-based dependent variable. The aim is to submit it as a registered report before collecting the data and so I need to have an analysis plan and estimated sample size/stopping rule.
